reviewText: It is, indeed, a short documentary clocking in at about a half hour. No new information but nicely done. Not a "must have" but enjoyable.

Too short; out of date documentary technique; amaturish production;  Or, perhaps Ken Burns has spoiled me for life.  Or, . . . . perhaps I'm just too hungry for information about Abraham Lincoln that doesn't exist.  This production didn't tell me anything I didn't already know.
